https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8huuagrSpdrRSJXAdTcGaBEWjIm.jpg A hilarious comedy about a Bengali patriarch Banku Babu who dominates his entire household in completely averse to changes until he meets with an accident which results in about of amnesia. When a local promoter demands his ancestral house, Banku Babu denies and gets injured in a squabble, starting to behave strangely, sometimes like his matinee idol Rajesh Khanna. Bonku Babu
